title: 2025 Spanish Grand Prix start time: how to watch, live stream and F1 schedule
summary: Formula 1 descends at the Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya for the 2025 Spanish Grand Prix,  with McLaren's Oscar Piastri narrowly leading the drivers' championship and Lando Norris hot on his heels…

qa_pairs.question: Which team does Oscar Piastri race for in the 2025 Formula 1 season?
What is the name of the circuit where the 2025 Spanish Grand Prix is held?
Who is in close contention with Oscar Piastri for the drivers' championship in 2025?
